law.catch_line: Cabinet to strengthen managed care component of KenPAC Program and to establish standards for access and quality for organizations serving Medicaid recipients.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 252, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 210, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 371, sec. 31, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 512, sec. 77, effective July 15, 1994.
